             throws java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getChord

        public Chord getChord(Pitch pitch,
                      double dissonanceIndex)
        Generates a chord for a root-group one instrument at a time in a random order.
        Parameters:
        pitch - The first pitch used in building the chord.
        dissonanceIndex - Tenney Harmonic Index. (0.0 - 1.0)
        Returns:
        A new Chord.

      • getChord

        public Chord getChord(Chord chord,
                      int root,
                      double dissonanceIndex)
        Generates a chord for a Root-group in relation to another chord.
        Parameters:
        chord - The chord to be built upon.
        root - Root-group of the new chord.
        dissonanceIndex - Tenney Harmonic Index. (0.0 - 1.0)
        Returns:
        A new Chord.

      • getChordWalk

        public Chord getChordWalk(Chord chord)
        Returns a new Chord one step away from input.
        Parameters:
        chord - The input chord.
        Returns:
        A new Chord.

      • getRandomRootPitch

        public Pitch getRandomRootPitch(int root,
                                int branch)
        Picks a simple note in relation to a branch from a Root-group.
        Parameters:
        root - Root-group pitch will belong to.
        branch - Branch pitch will belong to.
        Returns:
        A pitch.
